messages.title: FAIR IS WORTH FIGHTING FOR
messages.content:
Eric lives with his family in Bath, where he works as an occupational therapist at the RUH. He is involved in his local community both as a parent governor at his neighbourhood school and with the Woodcraft Folk. He is a long-time Green campaigner.

Eric believes that the time for positive action to protect all our children's futures is now. By voting Green you can help to combat climate change, stabilise the economy and address inequality. Green policies will make Bath a more sustainable place to live today and in the future.

Bath needs:
- action to retain all our green spaces;
- new homes that are carbon neutral;
- protection for local services and fair funding.

'Eric will bring a fresh political approach to Bath.'

keyPolicies.policyDescription: By voting Green you can help to combat climate change.
Stabilise the economy and address inequality.
Action to retain all our green spaces.
New homes that are carbon neutral.
Protection for local services and fair funding.
